title: Drawing, "Sketch of Floor Plan Facing a Lake, for Stage Set", June 13, 1922
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower left: THIS DRAWING IS MY PERSONAL PROPERTY / AND MUST BE RETURNED TO ME / HENRY DREYFUSS
signed: Signed in graphite, lower center: Henry Dreyfuss
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right: June 13, 192[...]
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Plan of house with rooms identified; lake upper margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch of Floor Plan Facing a Lake, for Stage Set", June 13, 1922.
June 13, 1922. Graphite, red crayon on paper. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-117.
